document.full_text: san francisco's civic art collection is valued at around $90 million, but much of it is damaged, a great deal has been neglected and many pieces are just plain lost.
document.title: city's art is a victim of neglect, damage and loss
lines_and_colors: san francisco's civic art collection is valued at around $90 million, but much of it is damaged, a great deal has been neglected and many pieces are just plain lost.
